spec_data.Name: perl-XML-XQL
spec_data.Description:
This is a Perl extension that allows you to perform XQL queries on XML
object trees. Currently only the XML::DOM module is supported, but
other implementations, like XML::Grove, may soon follow.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:38:38 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for querying XML tree structures with XQL
